name: PHASE (CoconutTimtam)
description:
An abstract space shooter

Controls

W = Accelerate

S = Brake

A = Turn Left

D = Turn Right

Left Mouse Button = Shoot Lasers (move the cursor to guide the lasers)

Objective

Take control of your triangle PHASE starship! Avoid the PHASE cubes and shoot as many PHASE cubes as you can until you die! Each PHASE cube is worth 10 points! Good luck!

Other

Health is displayed by the purple bar in the top left hand corner

When on the Game Over Screen left click to restart the game!

Recommended Music

Listen to your favourite song while playing!

Recommended Songs

- Phil Collins - In The Air Tonight (Remix)

- Halo Theme (Remix)

- Mystery Song
